short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deploy your static site to the cloud in seconds. Get working forms and a powerful API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BitBalloon turns static HTML, CSS, JS into a deployed app with working forms and packaged assets  served from a CDN.

BitBalloon is powered by an open API which you can use to deploy and update code, as well as hook events like form submissions into other services like CRM, etc.

Set your sites aloft!

Hosting is FREE for sites under the BitBalloon domain and just $5/month for premium!
